channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20121] investigate issues with TestReplicationScenariosAcidTables
item.description:
djaiswal have noticed that somehow ptest execution are getting more and more problems lately... it seems to me that these problems are coming from this test

2018-07-08T22:07:33,461 DEBUG [main] metastore.HiveMetaStoreClient: Unable to shutdown metastore client. Will try closing transport directly.
org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException: Cannot write to null outputStream

some links to more or less recent logs:
http://104.198.109.242/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-12481/failed/240_UTBatch_itests__hive-unit_9_tests/maven-test.txt
the hive.log is ~200M:
http://104.198.109.242/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-12481/failed/240_UTBatch_itests__hive-unit_9_tests/logs/hive.log

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: maheshk114 I opened this to collect what we know about this problem - I agree to disable it...but please open a separate ticket for that - I would welcome any findings about what causes the problem...I've so far found out that executing it by itself reproduces the issue; and runs for: 2,008.829
maheshk114 For now patch to comment out test has been committed to master

-1 overall



Vote Subsystem Runtime Comment
-1 patch 0m 11s /data/hiveptest/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-12488/patches/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-12488.patch does not apply to master. Rebase required? Wrong Branch? See http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HowToContribute for help.



Subsystem Report/Notes
Console output http://104.198.109.242/logs//PreCommit-HIVE-Build-12488/yetus.txt
Powered by Apache Yetus http://yetus.apache.org

This message was automatically generated.

kgyrtkirk

" Unable to shutdown metastore client' error is coming from shutting down syncMetaStoreClient, as both syncMetaStoreClient and metaStoreClient shares the same client.  I think in Hive:: close method, we should not call syncMetaStoreClient.close().

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12930802/HIVE-20121.01.patch

SUCCESS: +1 due to 1 test(s) being added or modified.

ERROR: -1 due to 3 failed/errored test(s), 14620 tests executed
Failed tests:

org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniDruidCliDriver.testCliDriver[druid_timestamptz] (batchId=191)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniDruidCliDriver.testCliDriver[druidmini_joins] (batchId=191)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniDruidCliDriver.testCliDriver[druidmini_masking] (batchId=191)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/12488/testReport
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/12488/console
Test logs: http://104.198.109.242/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-12488/

Messages:

Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.TestCheckPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.PrepPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.YetusPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ExecutionPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ReportingPhase
Tests exited with: TestsFailedException: 3 tests failed

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12930802 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

the test is disabled... but the issue is not fixed - and it might happen again...
maheshk114 it seems you are already know what the problem is.... are you fixing this?

kgyrtkirk
The issue with this test taking more time is because of number of test cases in a single file. So i have split it into two files.

The " Unable to shutdown metastore client' error is coming because of call to syncMetaStoreClient.close(). But even after fixing this, i did not see much improvements in execution time.

oh...I see; so far I assumed that the increased execution time was the main symptom....I'm not sure if this test is supposed to take that long...or does it?
sankarh anishek

I think if you have something which could fix handle "Unable to shutdown metastore client" we should commit that...that happened a lot lately...could you please open a ticket for it and upload it?
I see tests failing with the metastore problem; maheshk114 could you please open a ticket or attach the fix you have found?

kgyrtkirk

The fix for meta store reconnect will be merged by sankarh through HIVE-20209

Great! That fix is in...could we re-enable TestReplicationScenariosAcidTables?
If so just attach the patch...I think it would be better to have it enabled....

-1 overall
